name: Sticky Zeitgeist: Episode 3: A Trick With Ants

description:
Episode 3: A Trick With Ants

Season finale feat. Lauren Bousfield, Heaven Pegasus, Katie Dey, and Devi McCallion

💄💄💄

Controls = WASD/arrow keys + mouse.

List of episodes on main page. Episode 1 and 2 free.

✨✨✨

PC download only. Lowest resolution supported is 1360x768. Let us know if anything breaks and we'll fix it.

Sticky Zeitgeist was supported by a grant from the Sundance Institute New Frontier Lab Programs.
